      • available

        public boolean available(Game.Color c)
        Returns whether this tile contains no piece or contains a piece with a color not equal to the given color. In other words, it returns whether or not a Piece of the given color can move to this Tile.
        Parameters:
        c - The color to use
        Returns:
        Whether a piece of the given color can move to this tile.

      • setOccupator

        public void setOccupator(Piece p)
        Sets the occupator of this Tile to a Piece
        Parameters:
        p - The piece to use as the new occupator

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of this Tile, including the 'color' of the tile and any occupants (using the Game setting for unicode).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
